_source.description: The Neil Pryde Alize road bike is the perfect all-around racer. Featuring an aerodynamic, stiff and responsive build, the Alize carried the UnitedHealthcare Pro Cycling team to over 90 podiums in 2013. Features carbon fiber headset cups and front/rear dropouts. PU molding in head tube and bottom bracket shell make for a high tolerance control of wall thicknessBike Type: road Wheel Size: 700c Year Model: 2013 Size: 2XL (60cm) Frame: C6.7 Toray UD Fork: C6.7 Toray UD tapered Headset: integrated Stem: NeilPryde AL Matrix  Handlebars: NeilPryde AL Matrix Brakes: FSA Gossamer Brake Levers: Shimano 105 Front Derailleur: Shimano 105 Rear Derailleur: Shimano 105 Shift Levers: Shimano 105 Cassette: Shimano 105 11-25T Crankset: FSA Gossamer 50/34T Bottom Bracket: FSA PF30 Pedals: N/A Wheels: Mavic Aksium  Hubs: Mavic Aksium Saddle: NeilPryde Race Seatpost: NeilPryde Aeroblade CFGeometry: Head-Tube Length: N/A Seat Tube Length: 60 cm Top Tube Length: N/A Chainstay Length: 40.5 cm BB Drop: 70 mm Seat-Tube Angle: 73D Head-Tube Angle: 73D Fork Rake: 45mm Wheelbase: N/AColor: flat black NewBike ships unassembled. For your safety, we recommend that you have a professional bicycle mechanic assemble this bike.
_source.name: 2013 Neil Pryde Alize Carbon Road Bike Shimano 105 2XL (60cm)
